jcr:content.content:
# This script provides example actions for permission manipulation.
# This action will create group only if this group do not exist CREATE-GROUP test_group IF-NOT-EXISTS
# Change current context to specified authorizable FOR-GROUP test_group
# Purge will remove all permission for current context for whole subtree, starting from specified path as root PURGE /content/dam
# Remove-all will remove all privileges for current context REMOVE-ALL /content/geometrixx/en REMOVE-ALL /content/geometrixx/fr REMOVE-ALL /content/geometrixx/es REMOVE-ALL /content/geometrixx/it
# Allow and deny are common actions that can be used for setting privileges. ALLOW /apps READ ALLOW /libs READ ALLOW /tmp READ ALLOW /var READ ALLOW /etc READ READ_ACL MODIFY_ACL
ALLOW /content/geometrixx/en READ ALLOW /content/geometrixx/fr IF-EXIST READ ALLOW /content/geometrixx/es /* READ DENY /content/geometrixx/en REPLICATE DELETE MODIFY CREATE DENY /content/geometrixx/fr IF-EXIST REPLICATE DELETE MODIFY CREATE DENY /content/geometrixx/es /* DELETE DENY /content/geometrixx/it /* ALL
